question: Sunita Lakra, who announced her retirement recently, is a famous Indian player of which Sports?
explanation: Former Indian Hockey team captain and the teamâ€™s defender Sunita Lakra recently announced her retirement from International Hockey citing her knee injuries. In the 2018 Asian Champions Trophy, India bagged the second place under her captaincy. She was also a part of the Indian team that participated in the Rio Olympics, 2016. Though she could not participate in Tokyo Olympics, Sunita will hopefully return to play domestic Hockey after her knee surgery.
